item.title: Upload Multiple Files to Firebase Storage with Angular
item.description: Firebase makes it easy to upload a huge payload of raw files a cloud storage bucket. The following lesson will teach you how to upload files to Firebase Storage with Angular, including several advanced concepts about how to… Handle multiple simultaneous concurrent file uploads. Save the resulting download URL to Firestore. Display a progress bar and provide UI controls to pause, cancel, and resume uploads. This post first appeared as Episode 82 on AngularFirebase.
